Transferred_Post:
"I had to leave my mom's house because I have to go to work, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life."

However, the transferred post is not appropriate as it still contains a global attributional style. A specific attributional style would attribute the cause of the event to specific factors rather than generalizing it to every aspect of life.

Here's an example of a transferred post with a specific attributional style:

Transferred Post: "I had to leave my mom's house because I have to go to work, which means I'll probably miss out on some opportunities for personal growth and development, but I'm still committed to making the most of my time and exploring new interests."
